description: Commands for managing server parameter values for flexible server.

commands.name: az mysql flexible-server parameter list
commands.summary: List the parameter values for a flexible server.
examples: az mysql flexible-server parameter list --resource-group testGroup --server-name testserver
az mysql flexible-server parameter list --resource-group testGroup --server-name testserver --output table

commands.name: az mysql flexible-server parameter set
commands.summary: Update the parameter of a flexible server.
examples: az mysql flexible-server parameter set --resource-group testGroup --server-name testserver --name parameterName --value parameterValue
az mysql flexible-server parameter set --resource-group testGroup --server-name testserver --name parameterName

commands.name: az mysql flexible-server parameter set-batch
commands.summary: Batch update parameters of a flexible server.
examples: az mysql flexible-server parameter set-batch --resource-group testGroup --server-name testserver --source "user-override" --args key1="value1" key2="value2"

commands.name: az mysql flexible-server parameter show
commands.summary: Get the parameter for a flexible server.".
examples: az mysql flexible-server parameter show --resource-group testGroup --server-name testserver --name parameterName
